comment: Type 1 VAR appropriately scoped. 10 EIs cover all identified gaps from qualification readiness audit. Test additions will complete qualification evidence.

POST-REVIEW FINDING: NON-COMPLIANT. Two deficiencies identified:

DEFICIENCY 1: Placeholder Content in Section 8 (VAR Closure)
- Line 157: Contains '[RESOLUTION_DETAILS]', '[OUTCOME]', '[PERFORMER] - [DATE]'
- Per SOP-004 Section 9A.3, VAR Closure must document 'Final outcome and disposition'
- Placeholder content is unacceptable

DEFICIENCY 2: Documentation Not EFFECTIVE
- Per SOP-004 Section 10: 'Documentation Approved: Any controlled documents modified under the executable document are EFFECTIVE'
- VAR-003 EI-10 references 'RTM checked in at v1.1 DRAFT'
- VAR-003 EI-11 references 'RTM updated to remove xfail markers'
- SDLC-QMS-RTM is currently DRAFT v1.1, not EFFECTIVE
- SDLC-QMS-RS is also DRAFT v1.1, not EFFECTIVE
- VARs modifying controlled documents cannot close until those documents are EFFECTIVE

REQUIRED ACTIONS:
1. Complete Section 8 (VAR Closure) with actual resolution details and outcome
2. Ensure SDLC-QMS-RS and SDLC-QMS-RTM reach EFFECTIVE status before VAR post-review can pass

VERIFIED FRONTMATTER:
- title: 'Address Qualification Readiness Report Gaps'
- revision_summary: 'Initial draft'

POST-REVIEW COMPLETE. Verified: (1) Frontmatter present - title: 'Address Qualification Readiness Report Gaps', revision_summary: 'Initial draft'; (2) All 11 EIs in Section 7 show Pass outcome (EI-11 confirms xfail resolution via VAR-005); (3) Section 8 closure documents PASS outcome matching Section 6 proposal - all gap tests added, xfails fixed, 113/113 tests pass (CI-verified commit cd4d456); (4) Verified SDLC-QMS-RS v2.0 and SDLC-QMS-RTM v2.0 are EFFECTIVE; (5) No placeholder content found; (6) References complete including Qualification Readiness Report. Document is COMPLIANT.
